title: Binary Search的用法
contents:
我算是半路出家，现在正在学CS的一些课程，学校用python。自己想再学扎实一点，但是总不知道为什么不对
def bs(array, item):

  mid = len(array)//2

  left = array[:mid]

  right = array[mid:]



  while left < right:

    guess = array[mid]



    if guess == item:

      print(f"item {item} at index {mid} of {array}")

    elif guess > item:

      bs(left, item)

    else:

      bs(right, item)

  return None





a =[1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,0]



print(bs(a,0))
